website_summaries.verdict: Certified organic produce wash spray at a reasonable price per ounce of product.
pros: Perfect option for washing organic fruits and vegetables with its USDA-certified organic composition
Successfully removes waxes, chemicals, and pesticides
cons: With certain fruits and vegetables, it may leave a sticky substance behind

customer_reviews.title: Waxy spray doesn't rub on well
customer_reviews.text: The product instructions say to "rub for 20-30 seconds" after spraying the fruit. Maybe I just got a bad batch, but it doesn't rub onto the fruit easily after spraying it on; I give up after about 5 seconds. It feels waxy, almost sticky. I know it is not residue from the fruit because it is this way right out of the bottle, whether I spray an apple, a strawberry, or a stalk of celery - and that after thoroughly washing my hands. I've used other fruit washes before, and they have all been soapy and easy to use. I don't like this product, or at least the batch I received.
customer_reviews.author: Remy's Uncle

customer_reviews.title: I would never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a bad batch. I have used the natural (not organic)previously. It seemed no better than spraying with water, but it did not rinse well - as though you could almosts smell or taste it on the fruit. This made both my husband And I sick almost immediately. Maybe a coincidence the first time, but it was a week apart with two different types of fruit. I ended up throwing away all 3 bottles tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Sitarski

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This vegetable wash is not harmful, it has a refreshing citrus scent and you can feel and see that it cleans dirt and pesticides from our fruits and veggies. I have noticed that when they are washed with this product, the fruit and vegetables last a lot longer, too Thank you for a product that is safe, organic, and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That it is organic
customer_reviews.text: I Love that it is organic & the ease of the spryer. Cleans my fruits & Vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: D. Masci Bredin

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works
customer_reviews.text: Using it just to make my paranoid self better. After spraying and rubbing for 30 seconds, the skins of the items do feel different. But does it really work? Unfortunately I have no lab equipment to test this.
customer_reviews.author: Nitr0

customer_reviews.title: Clean fruit
customer_reviews.text: Makes fruit/veggies shine and look clean. Once you try this you will never go back to just rinsing veggies. A must have for fresh foods.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Broussard

customer_reviews.title: New organic formula is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: New organic formula doesn’t feel like it’s washing vegis or fruits. The spray feels like water on the produce. The only way you can tell it’s it water is the smell. The old formula felt like you were using a cleansing product, the new formula feels like water. Doesn’t feel like it works.
customer_reviews.author: Af retti

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this for years and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product because it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Komal B

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for years
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I would never eat fruit or vegetables without it. We have so many bad chemicals on our produce.
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I use this spray for all fruits and veggies. All natural and safe for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Trice

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Must at Our House!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years, cleans well. You can also purchase by the gallon to refill spray bottles.
customer_reviews.author: CSH

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do a good job and washes off well.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Not the same stuff from the store.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to be the same as the one you can buy in the store. Seems watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Gerard

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for quite some time, and are very happy with it. A lot of the fruit and vegetables one buys needs to be washed well first.
customer_reviews.author: CCR

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is now a must have in out home this product speaks for itself when you use it
customer_reviews.author: koda

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: One out of the 3 bottles arrived leaking. Amazon partially refunded. Great product otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this spray!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! We use it for every fresh vegetables or fruits I bring into my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work like the store bought bottle
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work like the one I bought at the grocery store... it's like it's diluted... barely takes off any of the thick coating on apples or grapes... wish I would have been able to return it in time for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner for vegetables to get the residual dirt and waxes and stuff off. A couple of sprays is all that's needed and 30 seconds of scrubbing in my hands does it. In many cases, as with lemons, I can see the difference visibly. Great ingredients, too, unless you prefer using 409!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Ligget

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time when washing fruits and vegetables that specifically are not organic. I use it regardless for the cleanliness of it all, but especially if I didn't purchase organic because of the pesticides. At least I feel comfortable knowing I'm removing most of them from the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It cleans fresh vegetables and fruits as advertised. There's no unpleasant odor left after rinsing. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Infotmed

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I used almost all of this. I'll probably order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Waisman

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Those Fruits & Veggies
customer_reviews.text: Works great at cleaning fruits & veggies. As for taste, I wash it off so I never taste it. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Fekete

customer_reviews.title: Use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: I use this for every cleaning job from bathtub, braces, sink, to fruits and vegetables, but you might be surprised it takes off fruit stains from clothes without damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: love2salsa2000

customer_reviews.title: Keep your family safe by removing unhealthy pesticides from fruits and vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I love this product to take pesticides off of fruits and vegetables. I also like how this company stands by their product. I received damaged bottles and they replaced them quickly
customer_reviews.author: arlene carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Use this consistently to watch all my veggies and fruit ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this consistently to wash all my veggies and fruit. Will definitely order again as the price and quantity was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Saber

customer_reviews.title: A great product for produce
customer_reviews.text: A great product for produce. Make sure you rinse well but works perfect removing the wax from apples and provides a sense of freshness of the produce.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Tomey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!!! I have been using it for years. To me, it is like an insurance policy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene A. Wrighton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Have been using this to wash our fruits and produce for years!
customer_reviews.author: XO.CEE

customer_reviews.title: Great price, smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Super price, smells pleasant. Better value than I have seen at the local grocery stores. Love that it is organic. Works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Herbert Shriver

product_meta.title: Veggie Wash Organic Fruit and Vegetable Wash, Pack of 3, 16-Ounce Each
product_meta.description: Veggie Wash Organic Fruit and Vegetable Wash is a great choice for you and your family. USDA certified, Organic Veggie Wash is made with all natural gentle cleaners, perfect for your organic produce. Safely remove wax, soil, agricultural chemicals, and handling residue found on both standard and organic fruits and vegetables. Veggie Wash has been a favorite for more than 15 years because it is effective and safe. Clean your organic produce without changing their organic characteristics with Veggie Wash Organic. Stop rinsing and start cleaning with Veggie Wash.
feature_bullets: Safely remove wax, soil, agricultural chemicals, and handling residue found on both standard and organic fruits and vegetables
Cut through wax and chemicals and be sure your fruits and vegetables are safely clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars102 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
